concept.title: What is a calendar event?
concept.shortdesc: This section provides information about what an event is.

conbody.p: A calendar event is a digital entry used to organize and schedule activities or reminders. Events typically include essential details to help manage time effectively. Below are the key components of a calendar event:

ul.li: Start Time: The exact time when the event begins (e.g., 10:00 AM).
End Time: The exact time when the event concludes (e.g., 11:00 AM).
Event Title: A short, descriptive name for the event (e.g., "Team Meeting" or "Doctor's Appointment"). The title helps identify the event's purpose at a glance in the calendar view.

Location: Specifies where the event will take place (e.g., "Room 101," "Zoom Link," or "Central Park"). Adding a location is especially useful for meetings, appointments, or events with attendees, as it provides clarity about the venue.
